mahajana sewaka sabandatha ha supirisudu dinaya washayen ada dinaya nam kara atha.merata saukhya sewawa ha mahajanathawa athara menma saukhya wruththikayan thula yahapath sambandhathawak godanangima aramunu kara ganimin thunwani waratath pawathwana jathika saukhya sathiya saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahathage upades paridi pawathwe.siyaluma mahajana niyojithayan hata thama pradeshaye pihiti rohalwalata gos ehi karya mandalaya hamu wi sakachcha kara rohale abhiwruddhiya patha katayuthu karana lesa saukhya amathyanshaya mahajana niyojithayanta danum di atha.apirisuduwa pawathina aayathanawalin roga bo wimata athi hakiyawa itha ihala mattamaka pawathina nisa ada dinaya supirisidu dinaya lesa nam kala bawa saukhya amathyanshaya pawasayi.jathika saukhya sathiye samarambhaka dinaya homagama mulika rohaledi saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena ha adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana mahathwarunge sahabhagithwayen pawathwe.in anathuruwa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha jathika saukhya sathiya aarambha kirima sambandhayen thorathuru bara dimath, paswaruwe rathmalana rajya aushadha nishpadana nithigatha sansthawe amudrawya gabadawa ha karyala parishraya wiwrutha kirimath sidu we.
